settings.auto-role.placeholder: Select automatically assigned roles for new members
settings.auto-role.embed.title: Automatic roles
settings.auto-role.embed.description:
The control panel for automatic roles.
You can install, edit, delete, and view such actions from the panel.
If you do not see the auto roles, then they are not selected!
settings.auto-role.mods.every.label: Everybody
settings.auto-role.mods.human.label: Members
settings.auto-role.mods.human.descriptio: Everyone will get roles except for apps
settings.auto-role.mods.bot.label: Apps
